content:
What a great question! Tracking your meditation practice alongside your sleep data can provide valuable insights into how mindfulness affects your sleep quality. Here are some mindfulness apps that integrate with Fitbit and allow you to track your meditation practice:

1. **Headspace**: Headspace is a popular meditation app that integrates with Fitbit, allowing you to track your meditation practice alongside your sleep data. You can connect your Fitbit account to Headspace and view your sleep data within the app.
2. **Calm**: Calm is another well-known meditation app that integrates with Fitbit. You can connect your Fitbit account to Calm and track your meditation practice, sleep quality, and other health metrics.
3. **Insight Timer**: Insight Timer is a free meditation app that integrates with Fitbit. You can track your meditation practice, sleep quality, and other health metrics, and even participate in guided meditations and discussions with the Insight Timer community.
4. **Buddhify**: Buddhify is a meditation app that integrates with Fitbit, allowing you to track your meditation practice alongside your sleep data. Buddhify also offers guided meditations for different parts of your day, such as waking up or going to bed.
5. **Mindfulness Studio**: Mindfulness Studio is a meditation app that integrates with Fitbit, allowing you to track your meditation practice, sleep quality, and other health metrics. The app offers guided meditations and tracks your progress over time.

All of these apps offer a range of features to help you track your meditation practice, including:

* Guided meditations and tracks your progress
* Customizable meditation sessions and goals
* Integration with Fitbit to track sleep quality and other health metrics
* Personalized insights and recommendations based on your meditation practice and sleep data
* Community features to connect with other meditators and track progress together

By using one of these apps, you'll be able to track your meditation practice alongside your sleep data, gaining valuable insights into how mindfulness affects your sleep quality.

Remember to explore each app's features and find the one that best fits your needs and meditation style.
